title: What is ecology? - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: Bert Van Bork and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Defines and illustrates basic terms in the science of ecology. Explores plant and animal relationships and their interdependence for survival through several major biomes. Addresses the constant danger of human activity to the ecological balance.
creator_credit_for_label: Bert Van Bork and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
